sentences.sentence: Has he got some unmentionable disease?
sentences.translation: 他有什么说不出口的病吗？

sentences.sentence: Why do people have so much trouble mentioning that unmentionable state?
sentences.translation: 为什么人们提起这件难以启齿的事时这么麻烦？

sentences.sentence: You'll spend an unmentionable number of hours, and sit up late at night coding when you really should go to bed.
sentences.translation: 你将会花费难以数清的时间，并且，还要做在电脑前面编码到很晚，直到你不得不睡觉为止。
